description.ko: VOID-3는 우주 공허의 가장 먼 곳에 위치한 고밀도 특이점으로, 시공간의 구조를 왜곡하는 기이한 자외선 빛을 발산합니다.
description.en: VOID-3 is a high-density singularity located in the farthest reaches of the cosmic void, emitting a haunting ultraviolet glow that distorts the fabric of space-time.

prompt: A hyper-realistic cinematic shot of a massive dark singularity named VOID-3 at the center of a deep cosmic nebula, swirling violet and obsidian energy clouds, light bending around the event horizon, stars being stretched into thin lines, 8k resolution, ethereal lighting, sci-fi aesthetic.
